name: EitherOr
0:
”Alexa, open Either Or.”
”Alexa, ask Either Or to choose between napping and homework and video games.”
”Alexa, ask Either Or should I cut the red wire or cut the blue wire?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: either or
des: Either Or takes a list of options from a user and chooses randomly between them. Need to justify some suspicious life choices? Feel free to ask as many times as necessary to get the response you were looking for. Just make sure to separate your choices using either the word "and" or the word "or" and your Alexa enabled device will be able to help you make the sorts of choices that truly don't matter.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
